dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4085 IH: Rail Inspector Safety Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Van Orden introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To require certain State departments of transportation to notify first responders of AskRail application, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rail Inspector Safety Act of 2023.

In addition to the amounts authorized under section 1118 of title 49, United States Code, there is authorized to be appropriated $3,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028, to remain available until expended, to increase the number of railroad, pipeline, and hazardous materials investigators within the National Transportation Safety Board.
